author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Caitong Securities' Q1, 2017 Profits Down, Chairman Retires
text:
April 28 (Reuters) - Caitong Securities Co Ltd:
* SAYS 2017 NET PROFIT DOWN 15.8 PERCENT Y/Y * SAYS CHAIRMAN SHEN JINING RESIGNS AS HE HAS REACHED RETIREMENT AGE
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE UP TO 3.8 BILLION YUAN ($600.08 million) CONVERTIBLE BONDS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FnG2bk ; bit.ly/2r5ux3Y ; bit.ly/2JxNbYU ; bit.ly/2r6X7Rs Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3325 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
